title: Team Quest looking for Coach and Manager
body:
Team Quest is an organisation currently competing in OOL and the SumSoc Series and are looking for management and coaching staff. We are an organisation based around the concept of development and self improvement and want to add support staff who can assist us with this goal.

We are looking for a Coach who will be in charge of:

- running scrims
- strategy and pick/ban
- player development

We are also looking for a manager to:

- set our weekly schedule and arrange scrims 
- ensure players are where they are needed when they are needed
- look out for any potential upcoming competitive opportunities.

Experience preferred but if you have the right mindset and are passionate about esports we will be excited to hear from you.

If you are interested contact Bardarella in game or email me at bardarellagg@gmail.com.

Cheers,
